properties.property:
[[pre_level]] text = """ They have analyzed the samples from your last mission and are ready for some further samples and tests. According to our analysis of the samples, Teegarden-B's stones resemble the stones that we humans used to have on earth. They aren't exactly the same, but they are close enough. As to the grass and moss you collected, they actually seem to be an even more nutritious version of the grass and moss we had on earth. It really makes one wonder why we haven't yet met any bigger life forms... Very interesting. One would assume that from these findings alone, this plant should be home to some bigger species. Like to those we used to have on earth. Back to our actual mission, though. Maybe we'll find the reason or the missing life. We probably just haven't seen one so far. """ profil = "Captain" background = "OuterSpace"
[[pre_level]] text = """ This place looks complicated. Sadly, the robots aren't in their intended position. We need some more samples, but not every robot is equipped with the same tools to collect them. Please just swap them around so that we have to correct the robots at the correct place. Sadly I needed to position the focus like that so you could see where you needed to go. That place is quite beautiful. A nice, small, very rocky beach. Therefore, we need water samples, further stone samples, and some sand samples. I hope you'll be able to navigate through here without problems. """ profil = "Captain"
[[after_level]] text = """ Once again, samples were collected. Very well done. I'll tell you the results later. Until then, you may all take a small break again. """ profil = "Captain"
